entry.title: WIND WARNING , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:45 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 07:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 9.7°C
Wind: E 16 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature falling to 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 except southeast 60 gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early this morning. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 late this morning. Temperature falling to 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:09 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low 6. Forecast issued 07:09 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
